actions.recommendation: Mild hearing loss detected bilaterally. A full audiogram is recommended to determine the nature of this loss, and if/what management may be necessary.

PSA testing: annually, from age 40 if one first-degree relative who had prostate cancer at <65yrs or female relatives diagnosed with BRCA1 or BRCA2 gene mutation breast cancer. From age 45 if history of prostate cancer on either the mother or fatherâ€™s side. Every 2 years from age 50.

Losing weight, particularly abdominal fat, can have great overall health benefits. Focus on whole, real, unprocessed foods, practice good sleep hygiene, and try to manage your stress as poor sleep and chronic stress are associated with weight gain.
